root.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Wrath of the Darkhul King
root.description: OverviewWrath of the Darkhul King is an beat 'em up based on the popular television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer created by Joss Whedon. In WotDK, you control Buffy Summers as she moves across 16 action stages, beating up vampires and staking them.In between action stages you are treated to short scenes between characters from the show, made from low-res photo collages with text subtitles.Although the game features villains from the show, it is based on a new story.
